name: RE:Spawn
description:
RE:Spawn is a game made during my year of preparation at Isart Digital, with Valérian Segado. The project started at the end of January and lasted 3 months.

The particularity of this game is that you can make the boxes appear or disappear thanks to the spawner.

The goal was to create a sokoban in Java Script using HTML/CSS tools compatible with Firefox, Chrome and Safari.
